news_header: Many food stores remain open during the strike.
news_original_title: Näin lakko vaikuttaa tänään ruokakauppojen aukioloon
news_text: Despite the ongoing strike, many food stores, including Kesko, S Group, and Lidl, remain open. The strike affects various store chains, but individual shops may adjust their hours. Fresh products are still available, and customers can expect substitutes for any out-of-stock items. The situation will be updated regularly on store websites.
